comment: The result of the ` mod ` operator satisfies the requirements for the remainder ` R ` in the division algorithm for a positive divisor. Variant of ~ divalgmod . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Oct-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Aug-2021.)
